thread.title: Brilliant city hotel which made us feel comfortable
thread.title_full: Brilliant city hotel which made us feel comfortable - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Dominic M
title: Brilliant city hotel which made us feel comfortable
text: Great rooms, very modern and stylish. The property has been outstanding clean and new looking! Love to Go again. There are parking facilities at Minories Car Park 24/7 on Weekends for 2 pounds a day and on weekdays 28 a day, which is fair for London.
